SEARCH
Package UTILITY

Class RayManager

java.lang.Object
UTILITY.RayManager
public class RayManager extends Object
The RayManager class manages the trajectory of a ray as it traverses the board, interacts with atoms and edges, and updates the visual representation of entrance and exit edges on the game board accordingly.

    • edgeUpdate

      public void edgeUpdate(int entrance, int exit, Color new_color)
      EdgeUpdate Updates the visuals of the edge numbers displayed on GUI. This method iterates through the list of edge numbers on the game board and updates the visuals. It sets the font to bold and changes the color of the entrance and exit edges to the specified new color.
      Parameters:
      entrance - The entrance edge number.
      exit - The exit edge number.
      new_color - The new color to be applied to the entrance and exit edges.

    • rayPath

      public void rayPath(EdgeManager board_edge_list, AtomManager atomManager)
      rayPath method computes the trajectory of a ray as it traverses the board, interacting with atoms and edges along its path. It checks for direct hits on atoms, total reflection due to atoms behind the ray, and changes in trajectory due to atoms on the sides of the ray's path. Also calls edgeUpdate to change up color and fonts based off direct hits, total reflection and deflection.
      Parameters:
      board_edge_list - The list of edges of the board.
      atomManager - The list of atoms on the board.
